projects.title: ViT Sequence Classifier
projects.description: Vision Transformer system for multi-digit sequence prediction using encoder-decoder architecture. Features interactive 2x2 grid drawing interface, real-time sequence inference with confidence scoring, and production-ready microservices deployment.

projects.title: Multi-modalilty - Image to text
projects.description: Image captioning system using CLIP vision encoder and GPT-2 text decoder with cross-attention. Features comprehensive evaluation metrics, dual model optimization strategies, and seamless integration with W&B and HuggingFace.
